column4: ive just changed my resolution from 1280x1024 to 1680x1050, and now my desktop background is split into 4 different "sections". it seems like the WM still thinks the machine is in 1280 resolution. im using feisty, and i changed the resolution with nvidia x settings
are you sure you don't have a tile/strech issue? :)
the picture is smaller than the screen reso?
yes. ive changed it to each mode, and everyone shows 4 seperate images. including stretched and scaled. each image is 'streatched' inside of its own little box
hmm... that is strange... i have no ideas for you... sorry :(
